title: Who Speaks for the Lazy? - Hippocrates' theory

content.question: In the third paragraph, the author discusses Hippocrates' theory in order to

choices.label: argue that environment has an immense influence on people
criticize the division of human nature into basic types
confirm that laziness leads to serious character flaws
establish the long-standing belief that habits of mind are innate

content.answer: establish the long-standing belief that habits of mind are innate

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
